channel.title: CVE Feed for Palantir -- com.palantir.acme.cerberus:cerberus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palantir -- com.palantir.acme.cerberus:cerberus

item.title: CVE-2023-30962|2024-08-02T14:45:24.249Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.acme.cerberus%3Acerberus
item.description: The Gotham Cerberus service was found to have a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could have allowed an attacker with access to Gotham to launch attacks against other users. This vulnerability is resolved in Cerberus 100.230704.0-27-g031dd58 .
